  <title>Niepołomice Forest Area of Interest</title>
  <abstract>This GeoPackage file contains polygons representing borders of Polish State Forest forest stand subcompartments, which were used as study area in the "How to get closer to actual forest stand height using GEDI? A case study in central European Scots pine stands" paper, authored by Wojciech Krawczyk and Piotr Wężyk, published in European Journal of Remote Sensing (https://doi.org/10.1080/22797254.2024.2399209). 

The dataset contains only forest stand subcompartments dominated by Sctos pine (Pinus sylvestris), located in the Niepołomice Forest. The subcompartments' borders are current for 2019. For more information about the data, refer to aforementioned paper.</abstract>
